short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your daily habits, standups, and future tasks. Think Trello but focused on daily self improvement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
